title: Oceanfront West Bali National Park Eco-Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Embrace West Bali National Park’s spectacular beauty with a villa stay at this eco-retreat, offering new levels of luxury in the heart of the wilderness. Return from days exploring the park to moments spent by the resort’s ocean-facing infinity pool, authentic Indonesian plates at The Octagon Ocean Club and soul-stirring sunsets best viewed from Wantilan Deck.

Renowned for its lush mangroves, savanna, monsoon forests and coral Islands, Menjangan Island is a paradise for nature lovers. Your days will be filled with a wealth of resort-backed excursions and activities, including traditional Balinese mejejaitan weaving and jamu-making, as well as a schedule filled with snorkelling, cycling, kayaking and more.
offer_address: West Bali National Park, Jalan Raya Seririt, Gilimanuk, Gerokgak, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81155, Indonesia

title: Villa Escape in Bali National Park
description: Venture off the beaten track and be rewarded with breathtaking ocean views and glimpses of rare wildlife in the midst of West Bali National Park. Check in to Plataran Menjangan Resort and Spa, a luxury eco-retreat on Bali’s north-west coast where deer amble amongst beautiful villas with open-air bathrooms, an infinity pool overlooking the ocean and a private jetty. Includes private return airport transfers, a four-course dining experience, cocktails and more.
offer_address: West Bali National Park, Jl. Raya Seririt - Gilimanuk, Gerokgak, Pejarakan, Gerokgak, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81155, Indonesia

title: Lavish Villa Escape in West Bali with Daily Dining
description: Venture off the beaten track and be rewarded with breathtaking ocean views and glimpses of rare wildlife in the midst of West Bali National Park. Check in to Plataran Menjangan Resort and Spa, a luxury eco-retreat on Bali’s north-west coast where deer amble amongst beautiful villas with open-air bathrooms and an infinity pool overlooking the ocean and a private jetty. Retreat to this tropical paradise away from the crowds and enjoy decadent daily dining including daily à la carte breakfast, your choice of lunch or dinner, daily afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and private return airport transfers.
offer_address: West Bali National Park, Jalan Raya Seririt, Gilimanuk, Gerokgak, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81155, Indonesia

title: Oceanfront West Bali National Park Eco-Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Cocktails
description:
Embrace West Bali National Park’s spectacular beauty with a villa stay at eco-retreat Plataran Menjangan Resort & Spa, offering new levels of luxury in the heart of the wilderness. Return from days exploring the park to moments spent by the resort’s ocean-facing infinity pool, authentic Indonesian plates at The Octagon Ocean Club and soul-stirring sunsets best viewed from Wantilan Deck.

Your days will be filled with a wealth of resort-backed excursions and activities, including traditional Balinese mejejaitan weaving and jamu-making, as well as a schedule filled with snorkelling, cycling, kayaking and more. Every morning, watch as the vivid ocean waters rush to meet the deer-filled hinterland and hear the sing-song cries of the Bali starling and wild bulls frolic in mangrove jungles.
offer_address: West Bali National Park, Jalan Raya Seririt, Gilimanuk, Gerokgak, Buleleng Regency, Bali 81155, Indonesia
